t:
I     
know my imaginary friend will.


“So, is your imaginary friend here now?”, asked the therapist.

“Yes”, I replied to an empty room.
c:
What did he ask you?


What do you do when #nobodybelieves in you. #Collab and share. #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba



#therapist #halucination #imaginaryfriend #emptiness #doctor





***SPOILER***

The catch here is, the therapist himself is my imaginary friend.
